Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable “Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.
LIGHT TO LIVE, WORK, RELAX AND PLAY – Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light (2200K to 6500K) for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors
Follow the sun – bring the outdoors inside and automate your lights to gradually shift color throughout the day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being and productivity
FAST PAIRING, NO HUB NEEDED – Bluetooth + WiFi makes pairing simple and easy. Guided setup takes you step-by-step to create the perfect smart home for you
VOICE CONTROL – Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant devices for complete voice control
CREATE SCENES AND ROUTINES – Set scenes or put your lights on a schedule, whether at home or away

Connected Max A19 60W Smart LED Bulb

By Cree Lighting

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable

“Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.

  • CONNECTS TO ALEXA: Be sure to enable the Cree Lighting smart skills in the Alexa app
  • QUICK START: Check out the QuickStart guide below for more information regarding bulb setup
  • SUPPORT: For additional support, check the back of your bulb box or user instructions on packaging

Read more

Read more

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use Connected Max bulbs on a 5GHz router?

No, Connected Max bulbs must be paired to a 2.4 GHz WiFi network. If you have a multi-band or mesh router, which supports both a both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, you can must connect to the 2.4GHz band. For detailed instructions and more help, download the Connected Max Wireless Router Guide.

What does it mean if my bulb is status is “offline” or the bulb is flashing?

A power outage or router service interruption disconnected the bulb from the network. While the bulbs do not need to have constant power, if the bulb does lose any power for a long duration of time, it might need to be reset. To do that, do not remove the bulb from the app. Just select the plus sign on the main menu in the top right-hand corner of the screen. Add the bulbs with the original steps, and all names and schedules given will remain and bring your bulb back to a functional state

Can I use Connected Max bulbs with a standard wall or lamp dimmer?

No, using with a standard wall or lamp dimmer will cause interference and your bulb will not operate as intended. All Connected Max bulbs are dimmable using the Cree Lighting app or with your connected voice assistant.

Can I turn the Connected Max bulb on or off at the light switch?

No, using a wall or lamp switch to turn off the bulb is not recommended. Turning power off at the switch will make the bulb inoperable in the app or with connected voice assistant. Any schedules or automation will not run as scheduled it power is off at the switch. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at the switch.

Can I use the Connected Max bulbs with a smart switches or plug?

No, since the bulb itself has smart technology built in, there is no need to connect to any other smart switch or plug. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at smart switch or plug.

Can the Connected Max bulbs be used outdoors?

Connected Max PAR38 is designed for use outdoors. Its UL wet rating means it can get wet and exposed directly to weather or water. The rest of the Connected Max family is UL Damp Rated, which means it can be used outdoors in a fixture that is not exposed to weather or water (such as carriage light) as long as they’re protected against weather and water contact. Any bulbs used outdoors need to be within range of your WiFi router. A weak WiFi signal may cause delays or interruptions in your controllability.

The Tile Starter Pack is an easy way to keep track of all the things you can’t live without. Mate is a versatile tracker that easily attaches to everyday must-haves likes keys, backpacks, wallets, and more. It has up to 250 ft Bluetooth range and a 3-year non-replaceable battery. Slim, Tile’s thinnest tracker, easily slides into your wallet, luggage tag, or a book. It has a 200 ft Bluetooth range and 3-year non-replaceable battery. Both Mate and Slim are water-resistant, work with Android and Apple® devices, have voice-assisted finding with Alexa, Google and Siri, and can be used to ring your phone if it ever gets lost.
TRACKER FOR KEYS, WALLETS AND MORE: Get started with our Mate and Slim to help you easily find what you can’t live without like your keys and wallet. Keep track of more for less with our multi-packs or give them to your friends and family as a gift.
FIND NEARBY — Use the Tile app to ring your Tile when it’s within Bluetooth range, or ask your Smart Home device to find it for you.
FIND FAR AWAY — When outside of Bluetooth range, use the Tile app to view your Tile’s most recent location on a map.
FIND YOUR PHONE- Double press the button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it’s on silent.
NOTIFY WHEN FOUND — Enlist the secure and anonymous help of the Tile Network to help find your things. If your lost Tile is found, If your Tile is lost, add your contact information so you can be reached when someone scans the QR code on your lost Tile.
ANDROID, IOS & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE – Find your things with the free Tile app on both iOS and Android devices. Tile also works with Amazon Alexa, Hey Google and Siri
TECH SPECS: Water-Resistant (IP67 rated), Up to 3-year non-replaceable battery, Up to 250 ft / 76 m Bluetooth range
UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM PLAN: Get proactive Smart Alert notifications when you leave something behind, and with Item Reimbursement, if we can’t find your Tiled item, we reimburse you.

Control your lights and appliances with a simple tap or by asking Siri. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories. Eve Energy lets you keep watch the energy your accessories are consuming and shows you how much they’re going to cost based on your entered electricity rate. Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Equipped with Apple HomeKit technology and UL certification, Eve Energy offers outstanding ease of use and advanced security. Eve Energy is quick & easy to set up, and you don’t need a bridge. And the best thing about all Eve accessories is how they protect your privacy: Eve does not harvest your personal data and there is no Eve cloud, so your data won’t get exposed. Local intelligence means all the processing is done locally and Eve accessories communicate directly with your iPhone, iPad, or home hub without any cloud dependency or bridge.
Eve Energy requires iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS
Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button; Effortlessly set up schedules to automatically switch devices – independently of your iPhone and home network
Control your appliances on the go or based on presence via a home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV)
Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
Joins your Thread network automatically (supports Bluetooth and Thread), and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home; HomeKit-enabled for unparalleled ease of use and advanced security; get up and running in a flash with quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway; UL-certified
100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

The Smart Plug & Power Meter is Thread-enabled.


Easy ways to make your home smart.

Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories.

Good to know:

  • Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
  • Quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway / UL-certified
  • Joins your Thread network automatically, and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home / supports Bluetooth and Thread
  • Apple HomeKit-enabled for outstanding ease of use and advanced security
  • 100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

Requirements: iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS; Controlling this HomeKit-enabled accessory automatically and away from home requires a HomePod or an Apple TV (4th generation or later) as a home hub

Power: Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W

Compatibility: Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances

Wireless Connection: Bluetooth, Thread

Dimensions: 2.8 x 1.5 x 2.4 in


Talk or tap to control your home.

Already made yourself comfortable? Hands tied? Turn your devices on and off with a simple tap or by asking Siri. You can also control Eve Energy directly via the built-in switch, which you can protect against curious fingers by activating the child lock.

Control your connected devices from anywhere – whether you’re strolling around the block or exploring the world. Your home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV) will keep you connected to your abode.




Put your appliances on autopilot.

Schedules enable you to automate lights, humidifiers, fans and other vital devices. You can then get on with your business while your accessories get on with theirs – all without the need for a home hub and independently of your iPhone or internet connection.

You could have a floor lamp turn on at sunset even if you’re not at home – that’s not only convenient, but also reassuring.

Automations and HomeKit scenes.

Automations seamlessly connect your HomeKit-enabled accessories. Have a light turn on as soon as the Eve Motion wireless motion sensor detects any movement. Or switch your appliances on and off based on whether someone is leaving or arriving home – and save precious power. As soon as the last person leaves home, all the lights and appliances will turn off automatically.

Combine multiple HomeKit-enabled accessories in a single scene and save yourself the hassle of running to and fro. A “Good Night” scene can turn on your bedside lamps, shut your shades and switch off all the other lights in your home with a single voice command.

Watch those Watts.

Curiosity. Costs. Conservation – reasons to monitor your power consumption and projected cost are aplenty. Eve Energy gives you the insight to embrace yours – and gain a complete overview by entering your electricity rate.

Read more


Robust smart home, with a big future ahead.

Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Thread is also a pillar of Matter – the smart home standard of the future.

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:48:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

SjoyBring M005 7 Inch Double Din Car Stereo

M005 Double Din Car Stereo features with a 7-inch capacitive touch screen, a user-friendly interface and modern functions design for your comfort and entertainment during driving trip.

From listening to FM AM Radio, casting the map navigating from your phone to big screen, keeping your passengers enjoy a movie in the trip, taking Bluetooth hands-free phone calls and even parking your car safely and fast, M005 car stereo will be your best driving partner!

Easy DIY installation, compatible with most car models7 inch HD LCD monitor, With Resolution 1024*600Compatible with Android and IOS phones for Mirror-LinkSupports Front/rear view camera video Input and Video outputBluetooth hands-free calling and audio streamIncludes rear camera, wireless remoteUSB for fast phone charging Built-in 16-band EQ settingsStylish 7 color Led buttonsSupports Steering Wheel ControlPre-amp & subwoofer outputsWorking Voltage: DC 12V; Max power output: 4x 60watt

Safer Parking

Our reversing rear camera adopts BMW interface, can make the connection more secure, more stable, simpler, much better than similar products.

Easy operation and wiring, easy operation and help driver a safe and easier parking.

Package includes an HD rear camera with night vision, a 170° ultra-wide viewing angle and a full waterproof design. The JOY-M005 was designed having your safety and comfort in mind, supporting rear and front view camera with an automatic display of image when in reverse.

Mirror Link for Android & IOS

Compatible with Android phones and IOS phones (No version limit). The function allows you to cast what’s displayed on your phone to the car stereo screen via original USB interface, easily realize map navigation, watch movies, etc.

Please Note:

1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function.

2. Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.

Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-clear MIC

With the updated Bluetooth 5.2, which is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, you can take and make calls in seconds by pairing it with your smartphone. Listen to your favorite music services and apps with the wireless Bluetooth audio stream, control tracks, volume and play / pause with a simple touch of a button.

Ultra-clear built-in microphone, hassle-free noise when making a phone call, so you can make a phone call easily while focusing on the road.

Full HD Capacitive Touchscreen

During driving, your family and friends can watch the TV show or movies with this multifunctional car radio which features a highly sensitive TFT HD capacitive touchscreen.

7 inch HD LCD capacitive monitor with resolution 1024 X 600, supports 1920 X 1080P and most video / audio file formats. Keep kids busy watching cartoons during long rides, watch your favorite TV show or movie with this MP5 player.

FM/AM Radio & Memory Function

FM: 87.5 MHz -107.9 MHz and AM: 52 KHz -1620 KHz radio frequency enables you to receive signal messages more reliably. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.

With this car radio you can enjoy stable reception, clear sound and a switchable tuner function even on the highway or in bad weather. Listen to your favorite radio shows in Europe, the USA and South America.

Steering Wheel Control

You can use the vehicle’s steering wheel buttons to answer and end calls, play music, switch modes and much more, all of which make your journey more comfortable.

Simply connect the SWC cable of your vehicle to the key1 or key2 cable of this device. Follow the instructions to learn the keys.

Note: If the SWC is a digital signal output (controlled by CANBUS), you will need to buy an SWC adapter that can convert digital signals to analog signals.

16-Band EQ Audio Setting

The car audio system- high sound quality experience for you

With a built-in preset EQ and user customized 16-band EQ options, this multimedia system is ideal for a wide variety of music styles and sound effects. Crystal clear sound and easily adjustable volume for the complete experience.

Subwoofer Output

Pre-Amp and Subwoofer outputs allow you to expand your system by adding up to 2 amps and/or signal processors. Easily enhance your sound from your speakers and make sure no sound distortion at the maximum volume.

Subwoofer Output make it possible to provide seamless and smooth sound characteristics with dynamic, high impact bass that lets you hear and feel the music.

Stylish LED Buttons & Physical Buttons

7 colors that change automatically with the possibility of setting a unique one of your choice and a stylish design for the LED buttons of this multimedia system!

Physical buttons, especially the rotating volume control that makes it easier to use while driving.

Important tips before ordering

1. JOY-M005 is standard size fits most brands of car models, but it’s also recommended to make sure if your dash board opening size is one of the following three sizes (No matter amazonconfirmedfit shows your vehicle model fits or not), if yes, our stereo can match your car perfectly:

Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173*98mm(6.81*3.86inch)- standard size commonly used by some Ford, Lincoln, and Chevrolet. (Note: not include all, some car models are of special size, need to purchase frame installation)Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the Asian: 178*100mm(7*4inch)-standard size commonly used by some of Nissan, Hyundai, KIA and Honda. (Note: not include all , some car models are special size, need to purchase frame installation)Other common sizes: 190*116mm(7.48*4.57inch)

2. If your DASH BOARD opening size is not the above three, then you need to buy a double din DASH KIT that fits your car model.

The brand installation DOUBLE DIN DASH KIT opening size is 173(W)×98MM(H) (Metra, PAC, Scosche, etc.) that can match with our stereo perfectly or modify your dashboard when you install the stereo.

3. Some cars may also require two additional accessories to complete the installation:

Wire harness adapter for your car model. ( Used to transfer your factory harness and ISO stereo wiring harness)Radio antenna adapter for your car model.

4. The head unit has a memory function. If the ACC wire (red wire) and the B+ wire (yellow wire) are connected reversely during the installation, the product will have no memory function after the power is off.

5. The working voltage of this car stereo is 12V, it can’t be used for large trucks with 24V, and the car stereo will be damaged when the voltage is over 16V.

6. This car stereo does Not CarPlay or android auto function.

【Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-Clear MIC】The upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, enables wireless streaming of music, calls, MP3 players and more. The built-in ultra-clear microphone realize clearer calls and more accurate voice control, never distract you from driving, ensure safer driving.
【Mirror Link for Android and iOS Phones】 The double din car stereo supports IOS & Android phone (no version limit) for mirror link function, mirror the screen of your smartphone and show Google Maps, Spotify, Youtube etc. in the car radio. Replacing the cell phone with a car screen to realize vehicle intelligence. (Please Note: 1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function. 2.Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.)
【Free reversing camera】The car radio supports the rear and front view and will display the image automatically when the vehicle shifts into reverse. HD night vision rear view camera is included, ultra-wide viewing angle of 170 ° and a fully waterproof design, helps to park more safely and easily.
【7 Inch Full Touch HD Capacitive Screen】 Functions with 1024 X 600 resolution 7 inch HD touch screen, support 1920 X 1080P video playback. High resolution screen quality, full capacitive touch screen for more sensitive and accurate operation. Physical buttons make it easier to use while driving, especially the rotating volume control.
【FM/AM Radio with Memory Function】 With FM radio that transmission power range is wider, signal coverage is wider, and more stations can be received, your journey is no longer boring. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.
【Important Tips】1. Please make sure if your dash board opening size fits our car stereo. If you find that our stereo size does not meet your dash size, please purchase a suitable dash kit. 2.Please read the instructions before installation and it is recommended to install at a professional car audio shop. 3. Some cars may also require two additional after accessories to complete the installation: Wire harness adapter and radio antenna adapter for your car model.
【Check Dash Board Size Fits】 No matter the garage search shows your vehicle model fits our car stereo or not, please read our stereo size carefully and measure your dashboard size, if the dimensions match one of the following three sizes, then our stereo will fit your model: ①Commonly used sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173×98mm(6.81×3.85inch); ②Commonly used sizes for car series in the Asian: 178×100mm(7×4inch); ③Other common sizes:190×116mm(7.48×4.56inch).
Ideal gift for special day like birthday, Father’s Day or Christmas, Thanksgiving Day.

Warranty & Support

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

Product Description

Elecsung- Design for a Better Life

With Elecsung superior range of waterproof bathroom TVs, add a touch of contemporary luxury to your bathroom and enjoy unlimited entertainment in your shower or bath. Elecsung TVs offer stunning picture quality and intelligent features and functions, designed and tested to be waterproof and safe for the whole family to use. Elecsung TV mirrors for bathrooms offer you an escape from the everyday, allowing you to wind down in the bath to your choice of movie! Of course, for those private moments when you don’t feel like watching television, your waterproof TV will transform into a discreet and elegant mirror.

Why Waterproof TV?

Imagine this: luxuriating in a steamy, bubbly bathtub with a glass of wine while watching your favorite TV show. However, making this addition does require special considerations. Choose a waterproof TV, and you’ll have no worries.

Features of 2022 Model Elecsung Waterproof Television

Full Screen Touch Control Option

Full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use

7 Touch Keys

If you don’t want to choose full screen touch control, then the TV with touch keys

On desk option

Except on-wall and in-wall installation, base stand option for on-desk

Key Features

• 22″ LED Magic Mirror Screen (Flat Panel)

• Bright Single-sided Transmissive Mirror, Super Narrow Border

• 1080P Full HD Resolution

• 7 Touch Keys for TV Control, Full Screen Touch Control (Optional)

• Built-in Bluetooth, WiFi and Speakers, TV, HMDI, USB and WLAN Inputs

• Earphone and COAX/Optical Audio Outputs, 2 x 5W Stereo Speakers (Waterproof)

• Waterproof and Dustproof (IP66) , Waterproof Remote Control (IP66)

• Full View Angle (178º/178º)

• VESA Holes Available (100mm x 100mm)

Invisible Mirror

Nano high transparent crystal mirror surface

New Magic Mirror Experience

IP66 waterproof, anti-fog and dustproof

Remote Control

Waterproof remote control with holder

Serial Number

Each TV has its serial number, it won’t be repeated.

Installation

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket
